fields.name: bin
fields.label: BIN
fields.description: The Building Identification Number (BIN) from NYC Department of Buildings

fields.name: job_number
fields.label: Job Number
fields.description: The DOB Job Application Number assigned when the applicant begins the application.

fields.name: document_number
fields.label: Document Number
fields.description: A sequential number assigned to each of the documents that make up a job application.

fields.name: job_type_code
fields.label: Job Type Code
fields.description: 2-digit code to indicate the overall job type for the application. Expected values are:  • A1 = Alteration Type I, A major alteration that will change the use, egress, or occupancy of the building. • A2 = Alteration Type II, An application with multiple types of work that do not affect the use, egress, or occupancy of the building. • A3 = Alteration Type III, One type of minor work that doesn't affect the use, egress, or occupancy of the building. • NB = New Building, An application to build a new structure. “NB” cannot be selected if any existing building elements are to remain—for example a part of an old foundation, a portion of a façade that will be incorporated into the construction, etc. • DM = Demolition, An application to fully or partially demolish an existing building. • PA = A Place of Assembly (PA) Certificate of Operation is required for premises where 75 or more members of the public gather indoors or 200 or more gather outdoors, for religious, recreational, educational, political, or social purposes, or to consume food or drink. This type of job filing is related to a NB or A1. • SC = Subdivision Condominiums, The division of a tax lot into several smaller tax lots allowing each condominium to have its own tax lot. • SI = Subdivision Improved, An improved subdivision is when one lot is being broken into several smaller lots. The Department of Finance must assign new lot numbers to subdivisions.U+0022

fields.name: pre_filing_date
fields.label: Pre-filing Date
fields.description: The date when a job application # is assigned at this status. This occurs when the applicant submits any part of the application (even a single form), in person or electronically

fields.name: latest_action_date
fields.label: Latest Action Date
fields.description: The date of the last update to the DOB record for the job filing

fields.name: job_status_code
fields.label: Job Status Code
fields.description: A single letter to indicate the overall status for the job application

fields.name: job_status_description
fields.label: Job Status Description
fields.description: The description of the job status code

fields.name: existing_story_count
fields.label: Existing Story Count
fields.description: This is the existing number of floors in the building, as reported by the applicant.

fields.name: existing_zoning_square_feet
fields.label: Existing Zoning Square Feet
fields.description: This is the Total Zoning Floor Area for the existing building, if any. This is only required for a Job Type of NB or A1.

fields.name: existing_dwelling_unit_count
fields.label: Existing Dwelling Unit Count
fields.description: This is the existing number of dwelling units in the building, as reported by the applicant.

fields.name: existing_occupancy_type_code
fields.label: Existing Occupancy Type
fields.description: A 1-3 character code that indicates the occupancy classification for the building.

fields.name: proposed_story_count
fields.label: Proposed Story Count
fields.description: This is the number of floors in the building after the work is done, as reported by the applicant.

fields.name: proposed_zoning_square_feet
fields.label: Proposed Zoning Square Feet
fields.description: This is the Total Zoning Floor Area for the building after the proposed work is completed. This is only required for a Job Type of NB or A1.

fields.name: proposed_dwelling_unit_count
fields.label: Proposed Dwelling Unit Count
fields.description: This is the proposed number of dwelling units in the building after the proposed work has been completed, as reported by the applicant.

fields.name: proposed_occupancy_type_code
fields.label: Proposed Occupancy Type
fields.description: A 1-3 character code that indicates the occupancy classification for the building after the proposed work has been completed.

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_permit_sequence
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Permit Sequence
fields.description: For duplicate job and document numbers, the permit sequence identifies the order in which permits were created

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_job_type_code
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Job Type
fields.description: A Certificate of Occupancy is issued after a new building is built or after a major alteration that affects the use, egress, or type of occupancy of the building. Expected values are: • A1 = Alteration Type I, A major alteration that will change the use, egress, or occupancy of the building. • NB = New Building, An application to build a new structure.

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_work_type_code
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Work Type
fields.description: Type of work associated with the Certificate of Occupancy

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_permit_status
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Permit Status
fields.description: The status of the application for a Certificate of Occupancy

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_filling_date
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Filing Date
fields.description: The filing date of the application for a Certificate of Occupancy

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_filing_status
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Filing Status
fields.description: The filing status of the application for a Certificate of Occupancy

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_job_start_date
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Job Start Date
fields.description: Start date of the job associated with the Certificate of Occupancy

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_historical_issue_date
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Historical Issue Date
fields.description: Date the Certificate of Occupancy was issued

fields.name: certificate_of_occupancy_expiration_date
fields.label: Certificate of Occupancy Expiration Date
fields.description: Expiration date of the Certificate of Occupancy
